name: FEARLESS FREDRICK EPISODE 1
description:
FEARLESS FREDRICK. Fredrick was just a soldier for a while until the fiends came.

you play as Fredrick on his mission to stop the fiends.

EP1:escape the captured fort of 5 floors that the fiends have taken over

EP2: [coming soon]

[this game is made from the same source code as another but is much better]
